channel.title: Another game in a batch!
channel.description:
[code]@echo off :login set /p user=Username? echo. >> users.txt echo. %user% >> users.txt goto :options :options cls echo Welcome, %user%. echo Type in P for play, and Main to go to the login screen set /p option=Option? if %option%==P goto :frame1 if %option%==p goto :frame1 if %option%==Main goto :login if %option%==main goto :login pause :frame1 cls echo _o_ echo The o is you. type l to go left underscore , r to go to the right underscore, echo and m to go to the middle underscore (you're on it when you begin) echo ONLY USE LOWER CASE set /p direction=Direction? if %direction%==l goto :leftunderscore if %direction%==r goto :rightunderscore if %direction%==m goto :frame1 pause :leftunderscore cls echo You've found the mysterious gem! echo. >> gemfinders.txt echo. %user% >> gemfinders.txt echo o__ echo The o is you. type l to go left underscore , r to go to the right underscore, echo and m to go to the middle underscore (you're on it when you begin) echo ONLY USE LOWER CASE set /p direction=Direction? if %direction%==l goto :leftunderscore if %direction%==r goto :rightunderscore if %direction%==m goto :frame1 pause :rightunderscore cls echo __o echo The o is you. type l to go left underscore , r to go to the right underscore, echo and m to go to the middle underscore (you're on it when you begin) echo ONLY USE LOWER CASE set /p direction=Direction? if %direction%==l goto :leftunderscore if %direction%==r goto :rightunderscore if %direction%==m goto :frame1 pause [/code]
Just made it. very basic lol.
EDIT : Post or I remove.

item.title: Another game in a batch!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

@echo off :login set /p user=Username? echo. >> users.txt echo. %user% >> users.txt goto :options :options cls echo Welcome, %user%. echo Type in P for play, and Main to go to the login screen set /p option=Option? if %option%==P goto :frame1 if %option%==p goto :frame1 if %option%==Main goto :login if %option%==main goto :login pause :frame1 cls echo _o_ echo The o is you. type l to go left underscore , r to go to the right underscore, echo and m to go to the middle underscore (you're on it when you begin) echo ONLY USE LOWER CASE set /p direction=Direction? if %direction%==l goto :leftunderscore if %direction%==r goto :rightunderscore if %direction%==m goto :frame1 pause :leftunderscore cls echo You've found the mysterious gem! echo. >> gemfinders.txt echo. %user% >> gemfinders.txt echo o__ echo The o is you. type l to go left underscore , r to go to the right underscore, echo and m to go to the middle underscore (you're on it when you begin) echo ONLY USE LOWER CASE set /p direction=Direction? if %direction%==l goto :leftunderscore if %direction%==r goto :rightunderscore if %direction%==m goto :frame1 pause :rightunderscore cls echo __o echo The o is you. type l to go left underscore , r to go to the right underscore, echo and m to go to the middle underscore (you're on it when you begin) echo ONLY USE LOWER CASE set /p direction=Direction? if %direction%==l goto :leftunderscore if %direction%==r goto :rightunderscore if %direction%==m goto :frame1 pause

Just made it. very basic lol.

EDIT : Post or I remove.
